desc: Belle & Blush is a girl's candy land full of makeup, skincare, gifts, stationery, and jewelry with makeup artists and estheticians on staff.  We offer facials, organic spray tans, lash extensions and tinting, as well as eyebrow waxing and tinting in Little Rock, AR.
